definition: the act of checking or adjusting (by comparison with a standard) the accuracy of a measuring instrument
details:
noun
- the act of checking or adjusting (by comparison with a standard) the accuracy of a measuring instrument
= synonyms: calibration
- the imposition of standards or regulations
= example: the imposition of standards or regulations
= synonyms: standardisation, normalization, normalisation
- the condition in which a standard has been successfully established
= example: the condition in which a standard has been successfully established
= synonyms: standardisation
